item.description:
Masterpiece Classic:

Downton Abbey

2010-2011 NR Seasons 1-2 DVD

Exposing the snobbery, backbiting and machinations of a disappearing class system, this series chronicles the comings and goings of the upper-crust Crawley family and their assorted servants.

Cast:Hugh Bonneville, Jim Carter, Elizabeth McGovern, Maggie Smith, Jessica Brown-Findlay, Laura Carmichael, Brendan Coyle, Michelle Dockery, Siobhan Finneran, Joanne Froggatt, Thomas Howes, Rob James-Collier, Rose Leslie, Phyllis Logan, Sophie McSheraGenres:Television, British TV Dramas, TV Dramas, British TVThis show is:Cerebral, Understated

Vegetarian dinner at 7:30, movie at 8:15

$25, sliding scale to $20, $5 less without food

Discussion of personality types by Enneagram expert, Herb Pearce, therapist, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.


www.herbpearce.com,              781 648 3737      , herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies - Downton Abbey
